quote: When you realize you've made a mistake, take immediate steps to correct it. – Dalai Lama
fact: Arnold Schonberg suffered from triskaidecaphobia, the fear of the number 13.  He died at 13 minutes from midnight on Friday the 13th.
joke: I heard there was a new store called Moderation. They have everything there
